select s.id, s.date_schedule, s.note, s.from_time, s.to_time, s.editor, s.controller, u.id as user, concat(u.firstname,u.lastname) as name_user from user u left join schedule s on (u.id = s.user and (s.date_schedule >= #{date_from} and s.date_schedule <= #{date_to})) order by user asc, s.date_schedule asc;
